comments: Tests covering query state checkpointing smoke test cases

statements.query: drop stream if exists test19_left_stream1
drop stream if exists test19_right_stream1
create stream if not exists test19_left_stream1 (i int, s string, ts datetime)
create stream if not exists test19_right_stream1 (ii int, ss string, tts datetime)
subscribe to select s, ss from test19_left_stream1 inner join test19_right_stream1 on i=ii and date_diff_within(10s, ts, tts) settings checkpoint_interval=1
insert into test19_left_stream1(i, s, ts) values (1, 's', '2022-05-23 15:45:10')
insert into test19_right_stream1(ii, ss, tts) values (1, 's1', '2022-05-23 15:44:59')
insert into test19_right_stream1(ii, ss, tts) values (1, 's2', '2022-05-23 15:45:00')
insert into test19_right_stream1(ii, ss, tts) values (1, 's3', '2022-05-23 15:45:09')
unsubscribe to '19200'

tests.name: recover-inner-range-join
tests.description: recover inner range join from state checkpoint

statements.query: drop stream if exists test19_left_stream1
drop stream if exists test19_right_stream1
create stream if not exists test19_left_stream1 (i int, s string, ts datetime)
create stream if not exists test19_right_stream1 (ii int, ss string, tts datetime)
subscribe to select s, ss from test19_left_stream1 inner join test19_right_stream1 on i=ii and date_diff_within(10s, ts, tts) settings checkpoint_interval=1
insert into test19_left_stream1(i, s, ts) values (1, 's', '2022-05-23 15:45:10')
recover from '19201'
kill query where query_id='19201' sync
unsubscribe to '19201'

statements.query: drop stream if exists test19_left_stream1
drop stream if exists test19_right_stream1
create stream if not exists test19_left_stream1 (i int, s string, ts datetime)
create stream if not exists test19_right_stream1 (ii int, ss string, tts datetime) primary key ii settings mode='versioned_kv'
subscribe to select s, ss from test19_left_stream1 inner join test19_right_stream1 on i=ii settings checkpoint_interval=1
insert into test19_right_stream1(ii, ss, tts) values (1, 's1', '2022-05-23 15:45:10')
insert into test19_right_stream1(ii, ss, tts) values (1, 's2', '2022-05-23 15:45:11')
insert into test19_left_stream1(i, s, ts) values (1, 's', '2022-05-23 15:45:10')
insert into test19_right_stream1(ii, ss, tts) values (2, 's2', '2022-05-23 15:45:10')
insert into test19_left_stream1(i, s, ts) values (2, 'ss', '2022-05-23 15:45:10')
unsubscribe to '19204'

statements.query: drop stream if exists test19_left_stream1
drop stream if exists test19_right_stream1

create stream if not exists test19_right_stream1 (ii int, ss string, tts datetime)
subscribe to select s, ss from test19_left_stream1 inner asof join test19_right_stream1 on i=ii AND test19_left_stream1.ts > test19_right_stream1.tts settings checkpoint_interval=1

create stream if not exists test19_right_stream1 (ii int, ss string, tts datetime)
